abstract: Peter P Mullen, Skadden Arps' first executive partner, dies at age 82.
snippet: Mr. Mullen, a lawyer, drove the law firm of Skadden, Arps, Slate, Meagher & Flom from a small, specialized firm to a fixture in the top tier of the corporate bar.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Mullen, a lawyer, drove the law firm of Skadden, Arps, Slate, Meagher & Flom from a small, specialized firm to a fixture in the top tier of the corporate bar.

headline.main: Peter Mullen, Power at a Leading Law Firm, Dies at 83
headline.print_headline: Peter Mullen, Power at a Leading Law Firm, Dies at 83
headline.seo: Peter Mullen, a Force Behind Skadden Arps, Dies at 83
